## MetadataInspector.getMethodMetadata() method

Get the metadata associated with the given key for a given method of the target class or prototype

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getMethodMetadata<T>(key: MetadataKey<T, MethodDecorator>, target: Object, methodName?: string, options?: InspectionOptions): T | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>MetadataKey&lt;T, MethodDecorator&gt;</code> | Metadata key |
|  target | <code>Object</code> | Class for static methods or prototype for instance methods |
|  methodName | <code>string</code> | Method name. If not present, default to '' to use the constructor |
|  options | <code>InspectionOptions</code> | Options for inspection |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T | undefined`
